abstract.p: This document, number thirty three in Carlo Conti Rossini's edition (and therefore CCR 33 according to Bausi's reference). The document is attested twice, once it follows immediately CCR 23 . Further, this document was apparently copied with some insignitificant changes into a small quire, which contains a number of documents likely copied from older documents (originals?) in the sixteenth century.
